model.name: JettyPluginList
model.description: Modello DataModel describing the available jetty-plugins

field.name: license
field.comment: might make sense to have a fixed set of licenses (maybe even a license class) at a later stage. So we can optionally hide plugins if they do not have a specific license and make them available only via cmdl switch or similar

field.name: installJar
field.description: If true a [pluginName]-[version].jar will be downloaded and installed

field.name: installConfigJar
field.description: If true a [pluginName]-[version]-config.jar will be downloaded and installed

field.name: installWar
field.description: If true a [pluginName]-[version].war will be downloaded and installed

field.name: repositoryUrl
field.description: Optional field to override the standard repo2 maven repository

field.name: groupId
field.description: Optional field to override the groupId: org.eclipse.jetty

field.name: version
field.description: Optional field to override the default plugin version
